title: Otso Waheela Carbon gravel bike gets more cargo mounts plus four new colors
content:
Looking to make a great bike even better, Otso just made the Waheela C a little more versatile. Which is impressive, considering it was already one of the most versatile carbon gravel bikes on the market. That distinction is thanks to the Tuning Chip dropout system which combines with massive tire clearance to adjust the [â€¦]

The post Otso Waheela Carbon gravel bike gets more cargo mounts plus four new colors appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
